switchpromotionconte.description: To take advantage of one of these great offers, select your utility.
switchpromotionconte.fineprinttext: * Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers who use 1,500 Ccf per year or less, enrolling with Ohio Natural Gas between {{currentMonthFirstDay}} and {{currentMonthLastDay}} using applicable promotion code; Visa Reward Card offer available only for such customers enrolling online at www.onlyong.com/NEWHOME2018. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the applicable Ohio choice program through their natural gas utility company. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.888.466.4427., write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit www.onlyong.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (12-Month plan: $150/$75; 6-Month plan: $75). Customer must have continuous active service with Ohio Natural Gas for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the reward card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
switchpromotionconte.heading: SPECIAL BONUS: Enroll online and receive a {{giftCardValue | currency:"$":0}} Visa® Reward Card!*
switchpromotionconte.text:
Enjoy our Lowest Available Fixed Price Offers!

How much will you pay for natural gas in your new home?

In Ohio, you can choose your natural gas supplier. And now that you're in your new home, planning for expenses can be difficult, especially your natural gas bill. Ohio Natural Gas has fixed price plans that can protect you from unpredictable gas prices and help you plan for expenses in your new home. To prove it, we've got two great offers.

SPECIAL BONUS: Enroll online and receive a {{giftCardValue | currency:"$":0}} Visa® Reward Card!*  

Why switch to Ohio Natural Gas?

We've been serving customers in Ohio since 2007. One call to us and we'll handle all the details. There will be no service interruption. Switching to Ohio Natural Gas is easy.

- Locate your most recent natural gas bill.

- Identify your utility account number.

- Select one of the plan offers and enroll. 

Hurry! Offer ends {{currentMonthLastDay}}!
